text: Minga may refer to: * Minga (surname) * Munich (Minga in the Austro-Bavarian language), the capital city of Bavaria, Germany * Minga Branch, a stream in the United States * Mink'a (hispanicized as minca, minga), a type of traditional communal work in the Andes * Minga, a television character from The Gumby Show * Mingə, a village in the Ismailli Rayon of Azerbaijan
title: Minga
